languages.text: {n}Глаза Соломона расширяются, но, проглотив бранные слова, он упрямо склоняет голову.{/n} "Слушаюсь. Если мой позор искупит толику боли, которую я принес — пусть будет так".
{n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Соломона расширяются, но, проглотив бранные слова, он упрямо склоняет голову.{/n} "Слушаюсь. Если мой позор искупит толику боли, которую я принес — пусть будет так".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne écarquille les yeux, mais après avoir ravalé une objection vulgaire, il incline résolument la tête.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira. Si ma honte peut expier ne serait-ce qu'une once de la peine que j'ai causée, je m'exécuterai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne écarquille les yeux, mais après avoir ravalé une objection vulgaire, il incline résolument la tête.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira. Si ma honte peut expier ne serait-ce qu'une once de la peine que j'ai causée, je m'exécuterai. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの目が見開かれたが、何か不敬な言葉を飲み込み、頑なに頭を下げた。{/n}「お望みのままに。私の恥で、私が与えた痛みのほんの一部でも償えるのなら、それで構いません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの目が見開かれたが、何か不敬な言葉を飲み込み、頑なに頭を下げた。{/n}「お望みのままに。私の恥で、私が与えた痛みのほんの一部でも償えるのなら、それで構いません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne abre los ojos de par en par, pero, tras tragarse un exabrupto, inclina la cabeza con testarudez.{/n} «Como desee. Si con mi vergüenza expío parte del dolor que he causado, que así sea».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne abre los ojos de par en par, pero, tras tragarse un exabrupto, inclina la cabeza con testarudez.{/n} «Como desee. Si con mi vergüenza expío parte del dolor que he causado, que así sea».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙瞪大了眼睛，努力咽下了即将爆发出来的脏话，随后固执地低下了头。{/n}“如你所愿。如果我的耻辱能弥补我造成的一小部分痛苦，那就这样吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙瞪大了眼睛，努力咽下了即将爆发出来的脏话，随后固执地低下了头。{/n}“如你所愿。如果我的耻辱能弥补我造成的一小部分痛苦，那就这样吧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor, öfke patlamasına hâkim olmayı başararak inatla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz. Utancım, sebep olduğum zararı bir nebze de olsa hafifletecekse buna razıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor, öfke patlamasına hâkim olmayı başararak inatla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz. Utancım, sebep olduğum zararı bir nebze de olsa hafifletecekse buna razıyım."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Augen weiten sich, aber nachdem er eine unwürdige Replik verschluckt hat, senkt er störrisch den Kopf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht. Wenn meine Schande auch nur einen Bruchteil des Leides lindert, das ich verursacht habe, dann sei es so."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's eyes widen, but after swallowing some profane outburst, he bows his head stubbornly.{/n} "As you will. If my shame will atone for a fraction of the pain I have caused, so be it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Augen weiten sich, aber nachdem er eine unwürdige Replik verschluckt hat, senkt er störrisch den Kopf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht. Wenn meine Schande auch nur einen Bruchteil des Leides lindert, das ich verursacht habe, dann sei es so."
